pymunk.examples ModuleÂ¶

The Pymunk Example suite.

Examples can be run by running the module example from a shell:

$> python -m pymunk.examples.basic_test

Its also possible to list all available tests with:

$> python -m pymunk.examples -l

Note that some examples require additional dependencies. Most of them use pygame, but some uses pyglet or other libraries for the specific task being shown.
